pr_title: GH-1960 treat commit as no-op if no updates in the txn

timeline.bodyText:
Would be nice if you could add a comment here.
// empty transactions commit as no-op, some SPARQL endpoints don't handle empty transactions
timeline.author: hmottestad

timeline.message:
GH-1960 treat commit as no-op if no updates in the txn

- check if txn string has content before sending update
- added regression test
- minor refactor: use StringBuilder instead of StringBuffer
